definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Yes, I sell high rate discharge lifepo4 batteries.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我卖的高倍率磷酸铁锂电池。

sentences.english: Lithium-based batteries offer many advantages over nickel and lead-based systems.
sentences.chinese: 锂电池提供了很多比镍或铅电池优越的特点。

sentences.english: Limiting voltage additives(overcharge protection additives) are closely related with the safety of lithium ion batteries.
sentences.chinese: 综述了二次锂电池过充电保护添加剂的原理及其特点。

sentences.english: The E6 uses the "Fe," BYD's lithium-ion ferrous phosphate battery.
sentences.chinese: E6使用的是“铁电池”，即比亚迪的磷酸铁锂电池。

sentences.english: Lüyuan offers at least one model of e-bike with a lithium battery.
sentences.chinese: 吕原至少提供了一个锂电池电动自行车模型。

sentences.english: The oxidizing sealing at the insulation terminal of lithium battery was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 主要叙述了锂电池绝缘端子的氧化封接问题。

sentences.english: The principle and characteristics of overcharge additives for secondary lithium batteries are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 综述了二次锂电池过充电保护添加剂的原理及其特点。

sentences.english: The results show that the batteries using LiFePO4 as cathode material have fairly good performances.
sentences.chinese: 测试结果显示磷酸铁锂电池的各方面性能均较优异。

sentences.english: Sparing no effort to realize the industrialization of LFP battery at present.
sentences.chinese: 目前正全力投入磷酸铁锂电池的产业化。

sentences.english: As batteries age, their internal resistance rises.
sentences.chinese: 锂电池的内电阻会随者它的老化而变高。

sentences.english: Is notebook 4 cores lithium battery charged full under the computer shuts machine down situation excessively for a long time?
sentences.chinese: 笔记本4芯锂电池在电脑关机情况下多长时间充满电？

sentences.english: Today, non-rechargeable lithium-based batteries are common.
sentences.chinese: 如今，不可充电的锂电池较为普遍。

sentences.english: Lithium battery can be non flexible packaging and metal packaging.
sentences.chinese: 锂电池可非为软包装和金属包装。
